td.br: Please complete this survey if you would like to be considered for Fall 2020 Pre-K Counts through LVCC. Face to face appointments have been delayed due to the COVID-19 outbreak but you will be contacted by phone or email within two weeks to explain the full application process.

td.a: Need a mask? Try making one :)
td.br: EASD Art teacher Christine Frobase shares directions in a YouTube video, and a PDF with some different mask making ideas is also attached!

The Regular Board Meeting of the Easton Area School District scheduled for Tuesday, April 21, 2020, at 7:00 p.m. will be held virtually via Zoom. You may listen to the meeting on your computer or phone, and there will be an opportunity to provide public comment.

Check out our new Tech Help 4 Staff pages, with information staff members can use during these work at home days. Help info includes: Secure School, Google Apps, Email, Seesaw, Zoom, Google Meet, Attendance, Teaching from Home and McGraw Hill.

a.aria-label: Show all articles from News and Announcements

font.i: Thank you for the continued support of your student’s remote learning. We know this has been an adjustment for you and your family. As you know, the Governor has extended the school closure through the end of the year so your children will need your guidance with this new teaching and learning process. The teachers are presenting new content. It is critical that your children stay engaged using the on-line platforms as that is the only way to receive instruction. That being said, the paper-pencil learning packets will continue to be available to families who are unable to access instruction on-line. Starting today, Monday, there will be a return bin for completed packets at each site. please place your completed packets in the bins. Please make certain your student’s name, school and teacher’s name is written on the pack cover. They will be retrieved each Friday. If you are able to scan or take pictures and email images of the completed work to your teacher, you will not need to submit the hard copies.
Estimados Padres y Encargardos de Alumnos de Primaria:

Gracias por el apoyo continuo con el aprendizaje remoto de su hijo/a. Sabemos que esto ha sido un cambio para usted y su familia. Como saben, el Gobernador ha extendido el cierre de la escuela hasta el final del año y sus hijos necesitaran su orientación con este nuevo proceso de enseñanza y aprendizaje. Los maestros presentaran nuevos contenidos. Es fundamental importante que sus hijos se mantengan involucrados utilizando las plataformas en línea, ya que esa es la única forma de recibir instrucción. De cualquier manera, los paquetes de aprendizaje de papel y lápiz seguirán estando disponibles para las familias que no pueden acceder la instrucción en línea. A partir de hoy, lunes, habrá un contenedor (recipiente) para delvolver los paquetes completados en cada sitio. Por favor aseguere de colocar los paquetes completos en los contenedores (recipientes) y asegúrese de que el nombre del alumno/a, la escuela y el nombre de el/la maestro/a estén escritos en la primera pagina del paquete. Estos paquetes seran recogidos todos los viernes. Si tiene la capacidad de escanear o tomar fotografías de las imágenes y mandar por correo electrónico el trabajo completado al maestro/a, no necesitará dejar los paquetes en los contenedores (recipientes).
